long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twitch Chat Downloader, Your Comprehensive Live Chat, and Replay Chat Recorder

Elevate your Twitch streaming experience with our cutting-edge browser extension, the Twitch Chat Downloader. This tool is designed not only to capture the flurry of comments, reactions, and conversations during live streams but also to record chat interactions from live replay videos and clips. It's perfect for streamers who want to analyze viewer engagement and for viewers who desire to revisit the lively discussions in chatrooms during intense streaming sessions.

The Twitch Chat Recorder is an essential tool for anyone looking to enhance their interaction with streamers and the Twitch community. Whether you're a streamer aiming to monitor and analyze the engagement levels of your viewers or a spectator wanting to save memorable chat moments for later review, this extension has got you covered.

Using the extension is straightforward and efficient. As a user, you can start the chat recording on any Twitch live room, live replay, or clip by clicking the "Record" button located at the top of the chat window on the right-hand side of your screen. Once activated, it begins to log all chat content. You can customize settings, such as specifying the number of chat messages to record before the extension automatically triggers a download, for example, setting it to download after every 5,000 messages.

When the set threshold is reached, the Twitch Chat Downloader automatically saves the recorded chats. Additionally, you have the option to manually download the chat data whenever you choose. To ensure that your data is both accessible and manageable, the Twitch Chat Exporter saves the chat logs in various formats including CSV, JSON, or XLSX (Excel), facilitating easy analysis or viewing at your convenience.


Data Privacy
Your data stays on your device and is not stored or transmitted to our servers. We prioritize keeping your information secure and confidential.

Disclaimer
This extension is an independently developed product by ExtensionsBox and has no association with Twitch Inc.
